title: Spinach Artichoke Dip
ingredients: 400 g / 14 oz artichoke hearts in brine (drained (Note 1))
1 tsp garlic powder (or 2 garlic cloves, minced)
½ cup sour cream or yoghurt (full fat recommended)
1 cup grated cheese (any with flavour like Cheddar, Colby, Tasty Cheese (Australian) (Note 5))

title: Devilled eggs
ingredients: 12 large eggs (50-55g / 2 oz each in shell, fridge cold (Note 1)
2 tsp Tabasco or other hot sauce
2 tsp mayonnaise (whole egg mayo preferred, or kewpie)
1/4 heaped teaspoon cooking salt / kosher sale (Note 3)
50 g/ 3 tbsp cold unsalted butter (cut into 1 cm / 0.2" cubes)

title: Truly Crispy Oven Baked Chicken Wings
ingredients: 4 lb / 2 kg chicken wings (cut into wingettes and drumettes (Note 1))
5 teaspoons baking powder (NOT BAKING SODA / BI-CARB SODA!!)

title: Spicy Baked Black Bean Nachos
ingredients: 1 10oz. can diced tomatoes with green chiles ($0.99)

title: Best Hummus
ingredients: 1 can (15 ounces) chickpeas, rinsed and drained, or 1 ½ cups cooked chickpeas
½ teaspoon baking soda (if you’re using canned chickpeas)
¼ cup lemon juice (from 1 ½ to 2 lemons), more to taste
½ teaspoon fine sea salt, to taste
2 to 4 tablespoons ice water, more as needed
Any of the following garnishes: drizzle of olive oil or zhoug sauce, sprinkle of ground sumac or paprika, chopped fresh parsley

title: Buffalo Chicken Dip
ingredients: 0.75 cup hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHot®)

title: Tzatziki Chickpea Salad
ingredients: 2 cucumbers (grated using a box grater, excess water squeezed out very well (3/4 cup once squeezed))
1 1/4 cups Greek yogurt (or thick plain yogurt)
2 1/2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil (plus extra for drizzling)
1/4 cup roughly chopped fresh dill (plus extra for sprinkling, or half the quantity chopped fresh mint (Note 1))
1 large garlic clove (crushed using garlic press, finely grate or very finely minced using a knife)
2 x 400g / 14 oz cans chickpeas (well drained (Note 2 for dried))
2 tbsp chopped capers (sub cornichons or dill pickles)

title: Shrimp Cocktail
ingredients: 1/2 cup Heinz chili sauce (see recipe note)
24 extra large tail-on raw shrimp (more if you are using smaller shrimp)

title: Baked camembert
ingredients: 250g camembert or brie, or other similar cheese
1 tbsp vermouth or dry white wine, or kirsch
crackers or toasted bread to serve

title: Halloumi fries
ingredients: 1 lemon zested, then cut into wedges for squeezing
3 tbsp za'atar plus extra for sprinkling
2 x 250g blocks halloumi cut into fries

title: Chow Mein
ingredients: 200g /6 oz chicken breast or thigh fillets (thinly sliced (Note 1 tenderise option))
1 1/2 tbsp peanut oil (or other cooking oil)
1 1/2 tbsp soy sauce (all purpose or light (Note 4))
2 tsp sugar (reduce to 1 tsp if using Mirin)

title: Kung Pao Chicken
ingredients: 1 lb / 500g chicken thigh (cut into bite size pieces)
2 tbsp peanut oil (or other cooking oil)
6 - 10 dried chillies ((adjust to taste), cut into 2cm/ 3/4" pieces, most seeds discarded (Note 7))
3 green onions (cut into 2cm/ 3/4" pieces, white parts separated from green)
1.5 tsp ground sichuan peppercorns (adjust to taste (Note 6))
3/4 cup whole peanuts (or 1/2 cup halved) (roasted unsalted)

title: Sweet and Sour Pork
ingredients: 400g/14oz pork scotch roast (aka pork neck, collar butt) or shoulder / butt, (cut into 2cm / 4/5" cubes (Note 1))
2 tbsp light soy sauce (or all purpose (Note 3))
1/3 cup apple cider vinegar (or 1/4 cup normal white vinegar)
3 tbsp pineapple juice (from a 227g/8oz can pineapple pieces in juice, preferably no added sugar, Note 4)
1 onion ((medium), cut into 2.5cm/ 1" cubes (brown, white, yellow))
1/2 red capsicum/bell pepper ((large), cut into 2.5cm / 1" cubes)
1/2 green capsicum/bell pepper ((large), cut into 2.5cm / 1" cubes)
1 cup pineapple pieces (from the can of pineapple under Sauce)

title: General Tso's Chicken
ingredients: 3 tbsp soy sauce - light or all-purpose (NOT dark soy, Note 1)
1 tbsp rice vinegar (sub white wine vinegar)
2 tsp chilli paste (any (Sambal Oelak is great))
600g/ 1.4 lb chicken thighs (boneless skinless, cut into 2.5cm / 1" pieces (breast / tenderloin - Note 2))
1 - 4 cups oil, for frying (peanut, vegetable or canola; Note 4)
1/2 teaspoon red chilli flakes (red pepper flakes)

title: Teriyaki Salmon Noodles
ingredients: 250 g / 8 oz salmon fillet ((s), skinless, sliced into 2cm / 0.7" strips (lengthwise, Note 1))
2 instant noodle / ramen noodle cakes ((discard seasoning packs) (Note 2 other noodles))
1 small bunch Chinese broccoli ((gai lan), cut into 5 cm / 2" lengths, leaves separated from stem (Note 3))

title: Tom Yum Soup (Thai Soup)
ingredients: 300g / 10oz whole prawns / shrimp (with heads and shells on (Note 7))
1.5 cm / 3/5" piece of galangal (cut into 4 slices (Note 2))
1/2 white onion ((medium sized), cut into wedges about 1 cm thick)
1 1/2 tbsp Thai roasted chili sauce (Nam Prik Pa, Note 6)

title: Korean Beef Bulgogi Rice Bowls - the easy way
ingredients: 500g / 1 lb beef mince ((ground beef), any fat % you like)
1 tbsp canola oil (or any other plain flavoured oil, + 2 tsp (to wilt baby spinach))
3 tbsp red apple (finely grated (skin on is fine, ~1/2 apple) (Note 1))
2 1/2 tbsp soy sauce (- all-purpose or light (Note 2))
2 tbsp soy sauce (- all-purpose or light (Note 2))
2 tsp rice vinegar (or apple cider vinegar)
white rice (medium or short grain, if you can)
4 large handfuls baby spinach (or similar chopped leafy greens - cabbage, kale)
1 large carrot (peeled and julienned or grated using box grater (I use a julienne shredding tool))
1/4 cup pickled ginger (I like pink for colour)
1 1/2 cups baby cos / romaine lettuce (torn into bite size pieces)

title: Bibimbap
ingredients: 4 cups cooked white rice (preferably short grain (Note 1))
250 g/8oz beef tenderloin or thick steak (very finely sliced (subs, Note 2))
1 tbsp soy sauce (light or all purpose (Note 4))
2 carrots (large, cut into 5 x 0.5cm/2 x 1/5" batons)
2 zucchini (large, cut into 5 x 0.5cm/2 x 1/5" batons)
1.5 tsp soy sauce (light or all purpose (Note 4))

title: Spring Roll recipe
ingredients: 400 g / 13 oz pork mince ((ground pork), or chicken or turkey)
6 dried shiitake mushrooms soaked in boiling water OR 8 fresh (Note 1)
1 1/2 cups shredded carrot (1 large or 2 small)
1 1/2 cups (packed) shredded green cabbage (any type is fine)
2 tsp soy sauce (light or all purpose is best, dark is also ok)
15 – 20 spring roll wrappers, defrosted (21.5 cm / 8” squares) OR 35 - 40 small spring roll wrappers (Note 2), or Egg Roll wrappers to make Egg Rolls (Note 6)
Oil for frying (I use vegetable) OR oil spray for baking (I use canola)

title: Dan Dan Noodles
ingredients: 2 tbsp Chinese sesame paste (sub tahini, Note 1)
1.5 tbsp Chinese chilli paste in oil (adjust spiciness (Note 2))
1 tsp Sichuan pepper powder (preferably freshly ground (Note 5))
1 tbsp Chinese cooking wine (sub 2 tbsp extra chicken stock)
30g (1/4 cup) Sui Mi Ya Cai (preserved mustard greens) (finely chopped (Note 8))

title: Satay Chicken Curry (Malaysian)
ingredients: 1 1/2 tsp paprika (sweet or normal, not smoked or spicy)
1 1/4 tsp chilli powder (adjust to taste (not US "Chili Powder", Note 1))
3 1/2 tsp curry powder (not HOT (any, Malaysian, generic, Clives of India, Keens))
1 1/4 tsp salt (cooking / kosher (or 1 tsp table salt))
750g / 1.5 lb chicken thigh fillets (cut into bite size pieces (Note 2))
3 - 6 birds eye chillies or other small hot red chillies (finely chopped (Note 3))
1/4 cup onion ((brown, white or yellow), finely diced (~ 1/4 onion))
400g / 14oz coconut milk (preferably full fat but light will be ok)
2 tbsp peanut butter (pure best but spread ok too, crunchy or smooth)
3 makrut lime leaves ((formerly kaffir lime leaves) (Note 6))
1 lemongrass stalk (white part only, smashed to burst open (Note 7))

title: Quick Beef Stir-Fry
ingredients: 1 pound beef sirloin, cut into 2-inch strips
1 red bell pepper, cut into matchsticks

title: Easy pad Thai
ingredients: 200g cooked and peeled tiger prawn tails left on
a small handful of coriander leaves

title: Healthy chicken katsu curry
ingredients: thumb-sized piece ginger peeled and finely chopped
2 spring onions finely sliced (include the green part)
1 medium carrot peeled into long strips with a vegetable peeler
⅓ cucumber peeled into long strips with a vegetable peeler
1 small red chilli finely chopped (deseeded if you don't like it too hot)

title: Crispy chilli beef
ingredients: 350g thin-cut minute steak very thinly sliced into strips
4 spring onions sliced, green and white parts separated
thumb-sized piece ginger cut into matchsticks
4 tbsp rice wine vinegar or white wine vinegar

title: Sweet & sour chicken
ingredients: sunflower or vegetable oil for frying
4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts cut into chunks
spring onions finely shredded, to serve
1 red pepper deseeded and chopped into chunks
3 red chillies 1 cut into chunks, 2 halved and deseeded
425g can pineapple chunks, drained and juice reserved
100ml rice wine vinegar or Chinese vinegar

title: Chicken noodle soup
ingredients: 900ml chicken or vegetable stock (or Miso soup mix)
2 tsp soy sauce plus extra for serving
mint or basil leaves and a little shredded chilli (optional), to serve

title: Miso soup
ingredients: 200g fresh silken tofu or firm if you prefer, cut into 1cm cubes
spring onion finely chopped, to serve

title: Soft Easy Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: ½ tsp baking soda (bi carb soda)
175g / 12 tbsp unsalted butter (cut into 2 cm/ 4/5" cubes (1.5 US sticks / 6 oz))
1 1/4 cups chocolate chips (separated (US: semi sweet chocolate chips or chunks))

title: Moist Blueberry Muffins
ingredients: 1 tsp baking soda / bi carb soda (sub extra 3 tsp baking powder)
1 cup white sugar (caster, granulated or superfine)
2 large eggs (at room temperature, lightly whisked (Note 2))

title: Soft Cut-Out Sugar Cookies
ingredients: 2 and 1/4 cups (281g) all-purpose flour (spooned & leveled), plus more as needed for rolling and work surface
3/4 cup (12 Tbsp; 170g) unsalted butter, softened to room temperature
1/4 teaspoon almond extract (optional, but makes the flavor outstanding)*
Royal Icing, Easy Glaze Icing, or Cookie Buttercream (royal icing is pictured)

title: Easy Cinnamon Rolls (from scratch)
ingredients: 2 and 3/4 cups (344g) all-purpose flour (spooned & leveled), plus more as needed
2 and 1/4 teaspoons Platinum Yeast from Red Star or any instant yeast (1 standard packet)
1/3 cup (67g) packed light or dark brown sugar
4 ounces (113g) full-fat block cream cheese, softened to room temperature
2 Tablespoons (28g) unsalted butter, softened to room temperature

title: Apple Pie by Grandma Ople
ingredients: 8 small Granny Smith apples, or as needed

title: Carrot Cake (Easy and ultra moist!)
ingredients: 440g / 20 oz can crushed pineapple (drained but RESERVE juice (Note 1))
1/4 cup (65 ml) reserved canned pineapple juice (from canned pineapple above)
3/4 cup (185 ml) milk (at room temperature (full or low fat))
1 tsp white vinegar (or lemon juice or other clear vinegar, (Note 2)
2 tsp baking soda ((aka bi carb soda, Note 3) (NOT BAKING POWDER))
4 cups (480g) icing sugar / powdered sugar (sifted if clumpy (Note 6))

title: Banana bread
ingredients: 140g butter softened, plus extra for the tin
handful dried banana chips for decoration

title: Ultimate chocolate cake
ingredients: 50g grated chocolate or 100g curls, to decorate

title: Simple, Fluffy Pancakes
ingredients: 4 tsp baking powder (NOT baking soda / bi-carb (Note 1))
1/4 cup white sugar (caster / super fine is best but not essential)
1 3/4 cups cups milk (any type, any fat %)

title: Really great waffles
ingredients: 2 1/2 tbsp caster sugar / superfine sugar (sub granulated / ordinary sugar)
1 1/3 cup milk (full fat, slightly warmed (not piping hot))
150g / 11 tbsp unsalted butter (melted and slightly cooled (not piping hot))

title: Eggs Benedict
ingredients: 3 egg yolks (from large eggs (55-60g / 2 oz each, Note 1))
1 1/2 tbsp lemon juice (plus more to taste)
175g/ 1 1/2 sticks unsalted butter (cut into 1.5 cm / 1/2" cubes (Note 2))
8 slices bacon (- streaky, Canadian (traditional) or other)
200g / 7oz shaved or sliced ham (16 slices, ie. 2 slices per muffin half)
4 English Muffins, split (or 8 slices other bread, or 4 brioche or other rolls)
1 tbsp each Chives and parlsey (roughly chopped, for garnish)

title: Scrambled eggs - soft and creamy, just as they should be!
Sheet Pan Breakfast Burritos with Creamy Chipotle Sauce
ingredients: 1 large russet potato, peeled and cubed (about 2 heaping cups – see notes for using hasbrowns)
half of a yellow onion, thinly sliced
1/2 tablespoon Better Than Bouillon Roasted Garlic Base (optional, but great for flavor)
1/2 tablespoon Better Than Bouillon Roasted Garlic Base (optional, but great for flavor)
6 large tortillas (more or less depending on size of your tortilla)
salsa, or chipotle sauce for dipping (ingredients in notes!)

title: The Ultimate Breakfast Sandwich
ingredients: 1/2 cup basic garlic butter tomato sauce

title: French Toast
ingredients: 6 slices brioche or white sandwich bread (slightly stale (Note 1))

title: Shakshuka (Middle Eastern Poached or Baked Eggs)
ingredients: 1 small red onion (peeled, halved and sliced)
1 small red capsicum (bell pepper) (halved lengthways and sliced into 0.5cm/1/4” strips)
1/2 cup / 125 ml chicken or vegetable broth (or water)
1/4 tsp EACH black pepper and cayenne pepper (or other hot spice, adjust to taste)
2 tbsp fresh parsley or coriander / cilantro (roughly chopped)
Pita or crusty bread, to serve

title: Easy pancakes
ingredients: 1 tbsp sunflower or vegetable oil plus a little extra for frying

title: Baked Mac and Cheese
ingredients: 2 cups freshly shredded cheese, gruyere best ((followed by cheddar and Colby) (Note 2))
1 cup freshly shredded mozzarella cheese (or more other cheese of choice (Note 2))

title: Lasagna
ingredients: 1 medium carrot (peeled and very finely diced)
1 cup pinot noir red wine (or other dry red wine (Note 2))
1/2 tsp EACH dried thyme and oregano
4 cups milk (preferably full fat but low fat ok)
2 cups gruyere or Colby cheese (shred yourself (or cheddar, Monterey Jack, OR 1 cup / 100g shredded parmesan) (Note 4))
Finely chopped basil or parsley (for garnish (optional))

title: Chicken Pot Pie
ingredients: 2 tsp chicken or vegetable stock powder (Note 2)
1/3 cup white wine (sub more chicken stock)
1 cup frozen peas (no need to thaw)
2 sheets puff pastry (enough to cover pots, with drape)

title: Creamy Garlic Chicken Recipe
ingredients: 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts (about 1.3 lbs. total)* ($6.49)

title: Classic Tomato Soup
ingredients: 1 large can (28 ounces) whole tomatoes, with their liquid
½ cup cooked Great Northern beans or cannellini beans, rinsed and drained
2 tablespoons unsalted butter, cut into a few pieces
1 teaspoon coconut sugar or brown sugar, to taste
Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
For the tomato-basil variation (optional): 10 to 15 fresh basil leaves, to taste

title: The Best Pot Roast
ingredients: 3 1/2 pound of beef shoulder or boneless chuck roast (look for a piece that is well marbled with fat for best results)
Salt, pepper, and Italian seasoning to taste
2 large yellow onions, thickly sliced, lengthwise (root to tip), about 4 cups sliced onion
Several carrots, peeled and cut into 2-inch segments

title: Classic Tuna Noodle Casserole
ingredients: 1 (10 3/4 oz) can Campbell's cream of mushroom soup

title: Cottage Pie
ingredients: 2 cups (500 ml) beef stock / broth (low sodium)
1 beef bouillon cube (crumbled (stock cube, or 1 tsp stock powder))
1 tsp dried thyme (or 3 sprigs fresh thyme)
1.2 kg / 2.5 lb potatoes (peeled and cut into 2.5cm / 1" cubes)

title: Salisbury steak meatballs with mushroom gravy
ingredients: 3 tsp dijon mustard (OR 2 tsp dry mustard powder)

title: Homemade Mac and Cheese
ingredients: 2.5 cups milk, or more as needed
salt and ground black pepper to taste

title: World's Best Lasagna
ingredients: 1.5 teaspoons salt, divided, or to taste

title: Shepherd's Pie
ingredients: 3/4 tsp each dried thyme and rosemary (or 2 sprigs fresh thyme + 1 sprig rosemary)
1 beef bouillon cube (crumbled (OXO brand crumbles easily))
1.2kg (2.2 lb) potatoes, peeled and cut into 2.5cm / 1" cubes

title: Chocolate Mousse
ingredients: 2 tablespoons (30mL) brewed espresso or very strong coffee
Raspberries and extra whipped cream, optional to serve

title: Carrot Cake
ingredients: 12 ounces cream cheese, at room temperature
9 tablespoons unsalted butter, at room temperature
Extra whole or chopped walnuts, for topping

title: The Best Pecan Pie
ingredients: 1 9-inch pie shell, frozen (freeze for half an hour if freshly made; I recommend our easy, flaky, sour cream pie crust)
2 cups pecans (210 g), coarsely chopped (save a few whole pecan halves to create a decoration on the surface of the pie if you want)

title: The Best Key Lime Pie
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups finely ground graham crackers (from about 9 crackers, 145 g)
1 tablespoon lime zest for filling plus 1/2 teaspoon for the topping
1/2 cup lime juice (from about 20 key limes or 4 to 6 regular limes)

title: Bread Pudding
ingredients: 1 loaf French bread, at least a day old, cut into 1-inch cubes (about 6-7 cups)
1/2 cup Kentucky bourbon whiskey (less or more to taste)

title: Creamy Rice Pudding
ingredients: 1/3 cup (66 grams) of uncooked short grain white rice

title: The Hands-Down Best Peanut Butter Cookie Recipe
ingredients: 1/2 cup (112 g) butter, unsalted or salted, room temperature
1/2 cup (110 g) packed brown sugar (light or dark)
1/4 teaspoon salt (if using salted butter, omit the salt)

title: The Best Oatmeal Raisin Cookies
ingredients: 1 cup (2 sticks) unsalted butter, softened, OR 1 cup shortening
1 cup brown sugar (light or dark), packed
3 cups rolled oats (We use Quaker Old Fashioned or Quick. Do NOT use instant.)

title: Strawberry Shortcake
ingredients: 1/2 cup (100 g) white granulated sugar for the strawberries
3 1/4 cups (455g) all purpose flour, divided (3 cups and 1/4 cup)
12 tablespoons (168g) unsalted butter, cut into small cubes

title: Lemon Curd
ingredients: 3 tbsp caster sugar ((superfine sugar) - or regular / granulated sugar)
3 egg yolks (from the eggs used in the meringue)
50g (3 1/2 tbsp) unsalted butter (cut into 1 cm / 1/2" cubes)

title: Pavlova Bombs
ingredients: 80 ml / 1/3 cup egg whites (from 3 large eggs (Note 1))
2/3 cups caster sugar ((superfine sugar), do not cut down, it will affect result!)
Lemon Curd (uses the 3 leftover yolks from the Pav)
(See in post for other options (- passionfruit pulp, pureed mango, chopped up fruit, chocolate sauce!))
1 cup heavy/thickened cream ((or any other whipping cream), COLD)
Option to stabilise (so you can whip cream day before - see here for how (Note 3))

title: Chocolate Self Saucing Pudding
ingredients: 1/3 cup (70g) white sugar (preferably caster/super fine but ordinary ok)

title: Sticky Grilled Chicken
ingredients: 1/4 cup soy sauce (all purpose or light (NOT dark))

title: Oven Pork Ribs with Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: 2 tsp garlic powder (sub with onion powder)
1.5 tsp onion powder (sub with garlic powder)
1 tsp cayenne pepper (omit for not spicy)
3/4 cup sweet alcoholic apple cider (hard cider) (or apple juice (Note 2))
1 1/2 cups tomato ketchup (or Aussie tomato sauce)
1/2 cup water (or use remaining apple cider!)
1 tsp Tabasco or cayenne pepper (optional, for spiciness)

title: Thai Grilled Chicken (Gai Yang)
ingredients: 2 lb / 1 kg chicken thigh fillets ((skinless, boneless) (Note 1))
1 large lemongrass stalk (white part only, reedy outer layers removed, sliced 5mm / 1/5" thick (Note 2 tube paste sub))
1 tbsp light soy sauce (or any all-purpose soy or tamari (Note 3))
3 tbsp (tightly packed) brown sugar or palm sugar
2 tbsp oil (vegetable, canola, or any other neutral flavoured oil)
Nam Jim Jaew (- traditional Thai Dipping Sauce for meat *RECOMMENDED*)

title: Grilled Vegetables
ingredients: 8 mini bell peppers (or 2 large bell peppers cut into ¼s, $1.44)

title: Marinated Grilled Shrimp
ingredients: 2 pounds fresh shrimp, peeled and deveined

title: Honey Soy Chicken - Marinade and Sauce (excellent grilled!)
ingredients: 1.25 - 1.5 kg/ 2.5 - 3 lb skinless boneless chicken thighs OR breast (Note 1)
1/2 cup soy sauce (all purpose or light (not dark, Note 2))
1/4 cup Chinese cooking wine or dry sherry (key ingredient, Note 3)

title: Beer Can Chicken
ingredients: 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil or other vegetable oil
1 opened, half-full can of beer, room temperature
1 tablespoon kosher salt or sea salt
2 tablespoons chopped fresh thyme leaves, or 1 Tbsp dried thyme

title: Grilled Corn on the Cob
ingredients: 4 ears fresh corn, in their husks
Butter (or an herb butter), for serving

title: Slow cooked Beef Ribs with barbecue sauce (beef short ribs)
ingredients: 6 x 300 - 350g / 10 - 12 oz beef ribs ((aka beef short ribs) (Note 1), patted dry)
1 tsp garlic powder (sub 1 tsp fresh garlic)
1 tsp cooking salt / kosher salt (reduce by 25% for table salt, increase 50% for salt flakes)
1/2 cup brown sugar (loosely packed (ie don't pack it tight)(sub white))
2 tsp EACH black pepper, onion powder, mustard powder (Note 2)
1 tsp cayenne pepper (adjust to taste re: spiciness)

title: Chimichurri butter
ingredients: 3/4 tsp cooking salt / kosher salt (reduce by 30% for table salt, + 30% for flakes)
1 tsp large red chilli (deseeded, finely minced (or Birds Eye/Thai, for extra spicy!))
1 tbsp red wine vinegar (or lemon juice)
1/4 cup finely minced parsley leaves (about 1 cup leaves before chopping)

title: Lamb Chops with Rosemary Gravy (Loin chops, forequarter, cutlets)
Steak Sandwich
ingredients: 3 large onions (peeled and finely sliced (brown, white or yellow))
60 g / 2 oz rocket /arugula or other lettuce of choice
Turkish bread (about 60cm / 2 feet long (or 4 rolls / buns of choice))

title: Favorite Quinoa Salad
ingredients: 1 cup uncooked quinoa, rinsed in a fine-mesh colander
1 can (15 ounces) chickpeas, rinsed and drained, or 1 ½ cups cooked chickpeas
¾ cup chopped red onion (from 1 small red onion)
1 cup finely chopped flat-leaf parsley (from 1 large bunch)
¼ cup lemon juice (from 2 to 3 lemons)
Freshly ground black pepper, to taste

title: Chicken Salad (Traditional)
ingredients: 1 rotisserie chicken, about 4 cups of meat ($5.97)

title: Classic Tuna Salad
ingredients: 2 12oz. cans chunk light tuna in water ($5.00*)

title: Coleslaw
ingredients: 1/2 cup Hellman's mayonnaise (or other whole egg mayo)
1/2 cup sour cream or yoghurt, (full fat is best)
1 1/2 tbsp apple cider vinegar (or sub with white wine vinegar)

title: Caesar Salad Wonton Cups
ingredients: 2 tsp fresh parsley (finely chopped (optional - for garnish))

title: The best Potato Salad
ingredients: 2 tsp cooking / kosher salt (for cooking potatoes)
1/2 cup French Dressing (- homemade (below) or store bought (Note 2))
3/4 cup cucumber, finely diced (1 x 15cm/6" cucumber, cut lengthwise and remove watery seeds first)
1 cups celery, finely sliced diagonally (~ 2 ribs)
1/4 cup white onion, finely minced (~ 1/2 onion (Note 3))
2 tbsp white wine vinegar (sub apple cider vinegar)
1 tbsp water (for volume, rather than more oil)

title: Strawberry Spinach Salad
ingredients: 1 quart strawberries - cleaned, hulled and sliced
10 ounces fresh spinach - rinsed, dried and torn into bite-size pieces

title: Nicoise Salad
ingredients: 1/3 cup lemon juice or red wine vinegar
2 teaspoons finely chopped fresh oregano or tarragon
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 grilled or otherwise cooked tuna steaks* (8 oz each) or 2-3 cans of tuna
6 hard boiled eggs, peeled and quartered lengthwise
1 1/4 pounds small young red potatoes or fingerling potatoes
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 medium heads Boston lettuce or butter lettuce, torn into bite-sized pieces
3 small ripe tomatoes, cored and cut into wedges
1/2 pound green beans, trimmed and cut into 2-inch pieces
2 Tbsp capers, rinsed and/or several anchovies (optional)

title: Cobb Salad
ingredients: 1/2 bunch of watercress, coarse stems discarded All lettuces should be rinsed, spun or patted dry, and coarsely chopped
2 ripe avocados, seed removed, peeled, and cut into 1/2-inch pieces
1 whole skinless boneless chicken breast (about 3/4 pound total), halved, cooked, and diced (see How to Poach Chicken)
2 hard-boiled large eggs, separated, the yolk finely chopped and the white finely chopped (see How to Make Hard Boiled Eggs)

title: Thai Beef Salad
ingredients: 1/2 tsp birds eye or Thai Chilli (deseeded and finely minced (Note 1))
1/4 tsp finely minced garlic (1/2 small clove)
1 tbsp grapeseed oil (or canola or vegetable oil)
7 - 8 oz / 200 - 250 g good quality beef steak - sirloin (at room temperature (Note 2))
1 tbsp oil (vegetable, peanut or canola oil)
1/2 cucumber (optional deseed) (cut horizontally then cut into slices (about 1/3 cup))

title: Salmon Salad with Asian Ginger Sesame Dressing
ingredients: 150g / 5 oz leafy crisp lettuce of choice (6 big handfuls)
2 tbsp soy sauce (light or all purpose)
2 1/2 tbsp rice vinegar (aka rice wine vinegar Note 3)
3 tbsp olive oil (or other neutral flavoured oil)

title: Caesar Salad - with homemade Caesar Salad Dressing
ingredients: 1 cup mayonnaise ((Hellman's or S&W Whole Egg) (Note 1))
1/2 tsp garlic (finely minced (use garlic press, if you can))
1/2 cup freshly grated parmesan cheese (or 1/3 cup store bought grated parmesan cheese (Note 3))
10 cups cos / romaine lettuce (chopped, wash & dried (1 large, 2 medium, 3 small) (Note 5))
2 - 4 eggs (cooked to your taste, peeled and halved)

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
ingredients: 600g/ 1.2lb chicken thigh ((boneless, skinless), cut into 3cm / 2.2" cubes (Note 1))
1/2 cup plain yoghurt, (full fat best (Greek is fine))
1 tsp each salt, cumin, ground coriander, paprika (sweet, normal or smokey)
1 onion, finely chopped (brown, white or yellow)
100 ml (1/3 cup + 1 tbsp) cream (thickened or pure is fine)

title: Butter Chicken
ingredients: 1/2 tsp chilli powder or cayenne pepper powder (Note 2)
1.5 lb / 750 g chicken thigh fillets, cut into bite size pieces
2 tbsp (30 g) ghee or butter, (OR 1 tbsp vegetable oil (Note 3))

title: Palak Paneer – Indian Spinach Curry with Homemade Fresh Cheese
ingredients: 1 batch homemade Paneer (Indian fresh cheese; recipe linked below)
30g / 2 tbsp ghee or unsalted butter (for pan frying, Note 2)
3/4 tsp salt (kosher/cooking salt (if using table salt, reduce by 1/4 tsp))
700g/ 1.4lb fresh spinach leaves (English spinach) (thoroughly washed and roughly chopped (~9 cups very tightly packed) (Note 6))
1/3 cup + 1 tbsp cream (pure, heavy or thickened)

title: Chana Masala
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups dry chickpeas (soaked overnight), or a 28-oz can low sodium chickpeas

title: Easy chicken curry
ingredients: 3 tbsp medium spice paste (tikka works well)
1 small bunch of coriander leaves chopped
naan breads or cooked basmati rice, to serve

title: Lamb biryani
ingredients: 400g lamb neck cut into small cubes
200g spinach cooked and water squeezed out

title: Vegetable samosas
ingredients: 2 tsp curry powder or your own spices according to taste

title: Chicken dopiaza
ingredients: 3 ginger half grated, half cut into strips to serve
1 tsp coriander seeds crushed using a pestle and mortar
2 tbsp ghee (or 1 tbsp vegetable oil and 1 tbsp unsalted butter)

title: Chicken jalfrezi
ingredients: handful of fresh, chopped coriander leaves
cooked basmati rice or naan bread to serve

title: Saag paneer
ingredients: 1 tsp chilli powder or Kashmiri chilli powder
1 green chilli roughly chopped, (include seeds for extra spice)

title: Chicken bhuna
ingredients: 3 medium onions 2 finely chopped, 1 roughly chopped

title: Lighter lamb kofta curry
ingredients: 400g can green lentils drained and rinsed
¼ tsp medium or hot chilli powder
3-4cm/1 ¼-1 ½in piece ginger finely chopped
¼ tsp medium to hot chilli powder
1 plump green chilli deseeded and thinly sliced
1 tbsp chopped coriander plus extra to serve

title: Carbonara (real)
ingredients: 175g/6 oz guanciale (pancetta or block bacon), (weight after skin removed (Note 1))
100g/3.5 oz parmigiano reggiano (finely shredded (or pecorino romano, sub parmesan, Note 3))

title: Easy Chicken Parmesan
ingredients: 1/2 large yellow onion, grated (don't cut onion in half, just grate half of a whole onion), about 3/4 cup of grated onion
2 tablespoons fresh basil leaves, thinly sliced

title: Eggplant Parmesan
ingredients: 1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil (plus more to oil the sheet pans)
2 28-oz cans whole peeled tomatoes (preferably San Marzano) that have been diced, reserving the juices, or crushed tomatoes
1/2 cup finely chopped fresh basil, packed
1 1/2 pounds fresh mozzarella, sliced into 1/4-inch slices

title: Classic Minestrone Soup
ingredients: 2 sprigs fresh thyme or a teaspoon of dried thyme
1 Yukon gold potato, peeled and cut into 3/4-inch chunks
2 cups sliced savoy or curly cabbage
2 medium fresh ripe tomatoes (romas if available), cored, peeled, chopped
6 cups chicken stock (or vegetable stock for vegetarian version)
1 15-ounce can cannellini or great northern white beans, drained (about 1 1/2 cups cooked white beans)

title: Pasta alla Norma (Eggplant pasta)
ingredients: 800g / 1.6 lb eggplant (cut into 2.5cm/1" cubes (2 medium/large ones))
1/4 cup dry white wine (anything not too sweet or woody (Note 1))
700g / 24 oz tomato passata (aka tomato puree, Note 2)
1/2 tsp red pepper flakes (optional (for a hint of heat))
300g / 10 oz spaghetti or other pasta, long or short (macaroni, rigatoni, penne, ziti, fettucini, bucatini)
Parmesan cheese (grated (or ricotta salata if you have it - more traditional))

title: JUICY Pesto Pasta!
ingredients: 300 - 350 g / 10 - 12 oz pasta of choice (ziti, penne and spaghetti are my favourites, Note 2)

title: Chicken Piccata (Lemon Chicken with Capers)
ingredients: 450g / 16oz chicken breast ((2 large pieces), skinless boneless (Note 1))
1 1/2 tsp parsley (finely chopped, plus more for garnish)

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil, divided, or as needed
salt and black pepper to taste

title: Gourmet Mushroom Risotto
ingredients: 6 cups chicken broth, or as needed
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

title: The best spaghetti bolognese recipe
ingredients: 4 rashers smoked streaky bacon finely chopped
2-3 sprigs rosemary leaves picked and finely chopped
small pack basil leaves picked, ¾ finely chopped and the rest left whole for garnish
1 red chilli deseeded and finely chopped (optional)
75g parmesan grated, plus extra to serve

title: Creamy mushroom pasta
ingredients: 200g parmesan (or vegetarian alternative), grated, plus extra to serve
½ small bunch parsley finely chopped

title: Easy Homemade Hummus
ingredients: 1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil (plus more for garnishing)
2 garlic cloves, mashed and roughly chopped
2 (15 ounce) cans of chickpeas (garbanzo beans), drained
Garnishes: A sprinkling of paprika, a swirl of olive oil, toasted pine nuts, and/or chopped parsley

title: Easy Tabbouleh
ingredients: 2 cups vegetable stock, chicken stock, or water
Juice and finely grated zest of 2 lemons
5-6 Roma or plum tomatoes, seeded and chopped

title: Lamb Koftas with Yoghurt Dressing
ingredients: 3/4 tsp cayenne pepper (this is a bit spicy, reduce to taste or leave out)
1 cup yogurt (Greek or other thick plain)
Shredded Red Cabbage, Carrot and Mint Salad (Note 3)
OR shredded lettuce, tomato and onion slices (Note 3)

title: Moussaka
ingredients: 2 tablespoons lemon juice, or more to taste
2 to 3 Yukon gold or other yellow potatoes
1 cup grated mizithra (or pecorino or Parmesan) cheese

title: Spanakopita
ingredients: 1 bunch scallions, thinly sliced, including some of the green part
1 pound phyllo (filo) dough (about 18 sheets), defrosted in the refrigerator

title: Chicken Souvlaki with Tzatziki
ingredients: 1.5 lb / 750 g chicken thigh fillets ((or breast), cut into 1"/2.5cm pieces)
2 Lebanese cucumbers (to make about ½ cup grated cucumber after squeezing out juice)
2 tsp white wine vinegar (or red wine or apple cider vinegar)
1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil (or more if you want richer)

title: Baklava
ingredients: 1 pound of chopped nuts (almonds, walnuts, or pistachios are best, or use a combination of them)

title: Lemon Chicken
ingredients: 3 to 4 pounds chicken parts (thighs and legs recommended), skin-on, bone-in, trimmed of excess fat
4 teaspoons lemon zest (about zest from 2 lemons)
2 tablespoons fresh chopped thyme (or 2 teaspoons dried)
2 teaspoons fresh chopped rosemary (or 1/2 teaspoon dried)

title: Mediterranean Greek Salad
ingredients: 1 cup black olives, pitted and sliced
0.33333334326744 cup diced oil packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained, oil reserved

title: Easy tzatziki
ingredients: 1 large cucumber peeled, halved and deseeded
1 small garlic clove crushed or finely chopped
small handful of mint leaves or dill sprigs, finely chopped

title: Shakshuka
ingredients: 1 red chilli deseeded and finely chopped
small bunch coriander stalks and leaves chopped separately

title: Greek salad
ingredients: 4 large vine tomatoes cut into irregular wedges
1 cucumber peeled, deseeded, then roughly chopped
½ a red onion thinly sliced
85g feta cheese cut into chunks (barrel matured feta is the best)
4 tbsp Greek extra virgin olive oil

title: Easy Carnitas
ingredients: 4 pounds boned pork shoulder, cut into large cubes (remove any large chunks of excess fat, but do not remove all the fat or you'll have dry, unflavorful carnitas)
2 cups chunky tomato salsa either prepared or homemade
2 cups fresh tomato salsa (pico de gallo)

title: Refried Beans
ingredients: 2 1/2 cups dry pinto beans (about 1 pound or 450g)
2 teaspoons salt (less or more to taste)
2 teaspoons dried oregano, or a large sprig fresh oregano
2 tablespoons (or more to taste) bacon fat or extra virgin olive oil
1/2 cup bean cooking liquid or water
Crumbled cotija cheese or grated cheddar cheese, optional

title: Easy Fish Tacos
ingredients: 1 pound cod, tilapia, halibut, or other white fish filets
2-3 teaspoons chili powder, enough to coat the fish
1/2 small head red cabbage, shredded (about 4 cups)

title: Tres Leches Cake
ingredients: 1 tablespoon melted unsalted butter, for brushing the cake pan
6 large eggs, whites and yolks separated

title: Chicken quesadillas
ingredients: 4 tbsp hot salsa from a jar
2 large flour tortillas seeded or plain
215g can kidney beans drained and roughly mashed
50g leftover roast chicken shredded (use the last of the meat on the carcass)
½ a 20g pack coriander leaves chopped (optional)

title: Mexican chicken burger
ingredients: ½ small garlic clove finely grated

title: Huevos rancheros
ingredients: 400g can red kidney beans drained and rinsed
handful pickled jalapeño peppers roughly chopped
1 lime half juiced, half cut into wedges, to serve

title: Taco salad
ingredients: ½ pack taco or fajita seasoning
400g can black beans drained but not rinsed
small bunch of coriander chopped or leaves picked
chilli sauce (optional), plus extra to serve

title: Chicken burrito bowl
ingredients: 1 small sweet potato cut into wedges
1 skinless chicken breast sliced into strips
400g can black beans drained and rinsed
1 small tortilla sliced into strips and grilled until crisp
hot sauce and lime wedges, to serve (optional)

title: Vegetarian Chili
ingredients: 4 oz. can fire roasted green chiles (with juices, $0.88)
15 oz. can dark kidney beans (drained and rinsed, $0.92)
15 oz. can black beans (drained and rinsed, $0.92)
15 oz. can pinto beans (drained and rinsed, $0.92)

title: One Pot Chicken and Rice
ingredients: 1.25 lbs. boneless, skinless chicken thighs (4-5 thighs) ($4.59)

title: Tomato Spinach One Pot Pasta
ingredients: freshly cracked black pepper to taste ($0.05)

title: One Pot Creamy Cajun Chicken Pasta
Homemade Chicken Noodle Soup (from scratch!)
ingredients: 1.8 kg / 3.5 lb whole chicken (rinsed and cleaned, the best quality you can afford (Note 1))
1 head of garlic (cut in half horiztonally)
4 thyme sprigs (or 1 1/2 tsp dried thyme leaves)
9 - 10 cups water (enough to just cover chicken)
2 medium carrots (cut in quarters lengthwise then chopped)
2 celery ribs (cut into 1 cm/ 1/2" thick pieces)
200 g/ 6 oz egg noodles or pasta of choice (Note 3)
2 - 3 tsp Vegeta or other stock powder (Note 4)

title: Minestrone Soup
ingredients: 1 cup small pasta (like ditalini, tiny shells, risoni/orzo, baby macaroni, alphabet or star pasta)
100g / 3oz green beans* (trimmed then cut into 2cm / 3/5" lengths)
2oz/ 60g baby spinach (or frozen spinach, kale or similar - can leave out)

title: Roasted Butternut Squash Soup
ingredients: 1 large butternut squash (about 3 pounds), halved vertically* and seeds removed
1 tablespoon olive oil, plus more for drizzling
½ cup chopped shallot (about 1 large shallot bulb)
Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
3 to 4 cups (24 to 32 ounces) vegetable broth, as needed

title: Boilermaker Tailgate Chili
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can chili beans in spicy sauce
2 (28 ounce) cans diced tomatoes with juice
1 green bell pepper, seeded and chopped
1 red bell pepper, seeded and chopped
2 green chile peppers, seeded and chopped
0.25 cup chili powder, or more to taste
2 teaspoons hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®)
1 teaspoon salt, or more to taste
1 teaspoon ground black pepper, or more to taste
1 (10.5 ounce) bag corn chips (such as Fritos®)

title: Shrimp and Grits
ingredients: 1 cup chopped white or yellow onion
1 to 1 1/2 pounds shrimp, peeled and deveined
3 green onions, chopped (white and light green parts only)

title: Red Beans and Rice
ingredients: 2 teaspoons of Cajun or Creole seasoning (Tony Chachere's or Zatarains) or to taste*
Cooked white rice (from about 3 cups raw rice)

title: One Pot Pasta Bolognese
ingredients: 500g / 1 lb beef mince (ground beef) (I use lean)
3 cups beef broth (or stock cubes + water, Note 2)
2 tsp Italian mixed herbs (options, see Note 3)
1/4 - 1/2 tsp chilli flakes (red pepper flakes) (adjust to taste)

title: Chicken Cacciatore
ingredients: 4 bone in chicken thighs large (1 kg / 2 lb)
2 rosemary sprigs ((about 15 cm/6" long), or 1 tsp dried rosemary)
3 anchovy fillets ((or 1 tsp anchovy paste), optional (Note 2))
2 red capsicum (sliced 8 mm thick (medium, not giant))
3/4 cup pinot noir (or other dry red wine (Note 3))

title: Fried Rice
ingredients: 120 g/4 oz bacon (chopped (optional, or use ham))
2 cups (packed) cooked day old white rice (refrigerated or frozen defrosted, Note 2)
1 tbsp Chinese cooking wine ((sub Mirin, cooking sake or dry sherry) (Note 4))
1 tbsp light soy sauce ((or all purpose) (Note 5))

title: Chicken Fried Rice
ingredients: 150g (5oz) chicken breast (finely sliced into small pieces)
1/2 cup frozen corn* (or can or fresh)
2.5 tbsp Chinese cooking wine or Mirin (Note 3)

title: Honey Garlic Chicken Breast
ingredients: 500g / 1 lb chicken breast (boneless and skinless (2 pieces))
3 1/2 tbsp (50g) unsalted butter (or 2 1/2 tbsp olive oil)
1 1/2 tbsp apple cider vinegar (or white or other clear vinegar)
1 tbsp soy sauce (light or all purpose (Note 2))

title: Teriyaki Chicken (With Homemade Teriyaki Sauce)
ingredients: 4 chicken thigh fillets (skinless and boneless (about 5oz/150g each))

title: Creamy Tomato and Spinach Pasta
ingredients: ½ tsp freshly cracked black pepper ($0.08)

title: Chicken Stir Fry Recipe
ingredients: 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts (about 1.5 lb. total) ($6.25)

title: Chicken Stir Fry
ingredients: 3 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, thinly sliced
1 (8 ounce) can sliced water chestnuts, drained
1 green bell pepper, cut into matchsticks

title: Pad Thai
ingredients: 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, cut into bite-sized pieces

title: Shrimp Scampi with Pasta
ingredients: 1 pinch kosher salt and freshly ground pepper
0.25 cup finely chopped fresh parsley leaves
1 teaspoon extra-virgin olive oil, or to taste

title: Lemon garlic salmon tray bake - easy & healthy!
ingredients: 4 x 180g/6 oz salmon fillets (skin on or off, doesn't matter (Note 1))
3 bunches asparagus (woody ends snapped or trimmed off (Note 4))
200g/ 7 oz cherry tomatoes (or grape tomatoes, 1 Aussie punnet)

title: Crispy Pan Fried Fish
ingredients: 2 thin fish fillets, around 150g/5 oz each, 1 cm / 2/5" thick, skin on or off (Note 1)
2 - 3 tbsp oil, enough to mostly thinly cover base (I use vegetable or canola)
Finely chopped parsley or dill (for garnish, optional)

title: Creamy Garlic Prawns (Shrimp)
ingredients: 1/4 cup dry white wine ((or more chicken stock) (Note 2))
1/2 cup chicken or vegetable stock/broth (low sodium)
1/2 cup parmesan (finely grated (grate your own, Note 3))

title: Lemon Chicken Salad
ingredients: 1 large chicken breast (halved horizontally* OR 2 boneless skinless chicken thighs)
8 cups cos/romaine lettuce (chopped (or other lettuce of choice, Note 2))
3/4 cup corn kernels (fresh or canned drained)

title: Chicken Stroganoff
ingredients: 600g / 1.2 lb chicken thighs (4 - 5) (boneless skinless (or breast or tenderloin, Note 1))
250 - 300 g / 8 - 10 oz pasta or egg noodles of choice (Note 3)

title: Beef & ginger stir-fry
ingredients: 500g beef rump, trimmed and cut into thin strips
4cm piece ginger peeled and cut into matchsticks
100g sugar snap peas cut into thin strips
6 spring onions trimmed and sliced diagonally

title: French Onion Soup
ingredients: 6 large red or yellow onions (about 3 pounds), peeled and thinly sliced root to stem (see How to Slice an Onion), about 10 cups of sliced onions total
8 cups of beef stock, chicken stock, or a combination of the two (traditionally the soup is made with beef stock)
1/2 cup of dry vermouth or dry white wine
1 tablespoon (loose) of fresh thyme (can also use a few sprigs of fresh thyme) OR 1/2 teaspoon dried thyme (more to taste)
8 slices French bread or baguette cut 1-inch thick
1 1/2 cups of grated Swiss Gruyere and a sprinkling of Parmesan

title: Clam Chowder with Corn
ingredients: About 6 pounds of quahog or cherrystone clams
1 tablespoon unsalted butter or extra virgin olive oil
4 ounces salt pork, cubed (or chopped bacon or pancetta, cubed)
1 tablespoon all-purpose flour (less or more, depending on how thick you want the soup)
1 cup dry white wine, like a Sauvignon Blanc (or 2 tablespoons white or cider vinegar, or lemon juice)
2 pounds potatoes (russets or Yukon gold), peeled and diced
1 teaspoon Old Bay seasoning (or paprika with a dash of cayenne)

title: Split Pea Soup
ingredients: Small toasted croutons (avoid for gluten-free version), to garnish
Chopped parsley or chives, to garnish

title: Potato Leek Soup
ingredients: 4 cups chicken broth (or vegetable broth for vegetarian option)
2 pounds potatoes (Yukon gold or Russet), peeled, diced into 1/2-inch pieces
1 teaspoon sea salt, less or more to taste
1 or 2 sprigs fresh thyme, or 1/2 teaspoon dried thyme
Sprinkle of Tabasco sauce or other red chili sauce
White or black pepper to taste

title: Broccoli Cheddar Soup
ingredients: 1 large head or two small heads broccoli (a little more than 1 pound), chopped into florets and stems

title: Chicken Tortilla Soup
ingredients: 6 (6-inch) corn tortillas, preferably a little old and dried out
1/4 cup corn oil, peanut oil, or extra virgin olive oil
1 medium Anaheim, poblano or jalapeño chile, seeded, veins removed, chopped (Depending on the hotness and flavor desired. You can also mix chiles - 1 Anaheim and a half jalapeño.)
4 cups chicken broth or homemade chicken stock
1/2 teaspoon coarse salt (kosher or sea salt)
1/2 cup (2 oz) shredded Monterey Jack cheese (or mild cheddar)

title: Chicken and Dumplings
ingredients: 1 quart chicken stock, homemade or store-bought
3 to 3 1/2 pounds chicken thighs and breasts, skin-on, bone-in, trimmed of excess fat
2 teaspoons butter or extra virgin olive oil, or a combination of both
2 to 3 celery stalks, trimmed and cut into 1/2-inch pieces (about 2 cups)
3 medium carrots, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch pieces (about 2 cups)
2 cups (250 g) cake flour (can sub all-purpose flour, but use cake flour if you have it, your dumplings will be fluffier)
1/4 cup minced fresh herb leaves such as parsley, chives, and tarragon (optional)

title: Gazpacho
ingredients: 6 ripe tomatoes (about 3 pounds), peeled and chopped (about 6 cups)
1 red or green bell pepper, chopped
2 cups tomato juice, or 1 (15-ounce) can crushed tomatoes
1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce (omit for vegan or vegetarian option)
2 teaspoons sugar, or more to taste
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
6 or more drops Tabasco sauce to taste

title: Cioppino
ingredients: 3 pounds halibut, sea bass, or other firm white fish, cut into inch-long cubes
1 large (2 lb or more) cooked Dungeness crab (hard shell)
2 pounds little neck clams and/or mussels (mussels should be scrubbed clean and beards removed right before cooking)
1 cup chopped bell pepper (1 large bell pepper)
An herb bouquet of bay leaf, parsley, and basil wrapped in a layer of cheesecloth and secured with kitchen string

title: Laksa Noodle Soup
ingredients: 1 1/2 tsp soy sauce (light or all purpose)
1 tbsp Sriracha sauce (or other chilli sauce)
1 tbsp chilli paste from jar (or more Sriracha)

title: Emergency Corn Chowder Soup
ingredients: 1 2/3 cups (400ml) chicken stock (/ broth (1 empty can*))
1/2 cup (125 ml) milk (any fat % (1/4 empty can*))

title: Quick and Easy Chicken Noodle Soup
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste

title: Thai chicken soup
ingredients: juice 1 lime plus wedges to serve
thumb-sized piece ginger bashed and sliced

title: Slow-cooker beef stew
ingredients: 3 carrots halved and cut into chunks
2 beef stock cubes or stock pots
900g beef for braising such as skirt, buy a whole piece and cut it yourself for bigger chunks or buy ready-diced

title: Chunky vegetable soup
ingredients: 1l vegetable stock made with 2 tsp bouillon powder (gluten-free, if needed)
250g asparagus stems cut into chunks, tips separated
160g baby frozen broad beans or soya beans
30g pack of basil stems and leaves separated and finely chopped
3 tbsp basil stems and leaves (taken from the 30g in the soup ingredients above)

title: Spicy Coconut Vegetable Stir Fry
ingredients: 1 Tbsp high heat cooking oil of choice ($0.04)

title: Vegetarian Sweet Potato Tacos with Lime Crema
Thai Red Curry with Vegetables
ingredients: 1 ¼ cups brown jasmine rice or long-grain brown rice, rinsed
1 tablespoon coconut oil or olive oil
Pinch of salt, more to taste
1 tablespoon finely grated fresh ginger (about a 1-inch nub of ginger)
1 red bell pepper, sliced into thin 2-inch long strips
1 yellow, orange or green bell pepper, sliced into thin 2-inch long strips
3 carrots, peeled and sliced on the diagonal into ¼-inch thick rounds (about 1 cup)
1 ½ cups packed thinly sliced kale (tough ribs removed first), preferably the Tuscan/lacinato/dinosaur variety
1 ½ teaspoons coconut sugar or turbinado (raw) sugar or brown sugar
2 teaspoons rice vinegar or fresh lime juice
Garnishes/sides: handful of chopped fresh basil or cilantro, optional red pepper flakes, optional sriracha or chili garlic sauce

title: Saucy Vegetable Stir Fry
ingredients: 3 medium buk choy (or other leafy greens of choice (Note 1))
1 1/2 tbsp soy sauce (light or all purpose (not dark soy) (Note 2))
1 tbsp Chinese Cooking Wine or Mirin (Note 3)

title: Veggie chilli
ingredients: 1 can kidney beans in chilli sauce

title: Easy ratatouille
ingredients: 1 tsp dried oregano basil or Italian mixed herbs
small bunch basil chopped, plus a few leaves to serve

title: Vegetarian lasagne
ingredients: 3 red peppers cut into large chunks
2 aubergines cut into ½ cm thick slices
8 tbsp olive oil plus extra for the dish

title: Mushroom stroganoff
ingredients: 1 tbsp Worcestershire sauce or vegetarian alternative
small bunch of parsley roughly chopped
